t: EasyCoper Tool for Coping Crown Molding - Louisville Tool Library
s: EasyCoper is a durable plastic aid, designed by a professional carpenter out of a need to simplify the coping of crown molding. EasyCoper allows you to use a jig saw instead of a regular hand-held coping saw, thus reducing wrist and hand stress, as well as arm fatigue.
